name: Four Aces (bixarrio)
description:
Four Aces

Four Aces is a simple little patience card game with a low rate of success. It only turns out around 4% of the time making it all the more exciting when you win.

The goal is to consume the whole 52 card deck and reduce all four working piles to only aces.

Click the deck to deal four cards into the play area. Discard the lower cards of any cards in the same suit by clicking on them. Aces count highest and cannot be discarded.

When a pile is empty, clicking a card that cannot be discarded on any other pile will move it into the space.

If no more cards can be discarded, and there are no more spaces, click the deck again to deal four new cards into the play area.

When the deck is exhausted and there are no more moves left, the game is over.

NOTES

  • There is currently no sound in the game, but will be updated soon
  • Holding the right mouse button on a card in a working pile will bring it to the front
